name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My Tasks: Todo-List for Google Chrome

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My Tasks will replace your default 'new tab' page with a minimalist tool that helps you keep organized your daily tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is Todo List application which will replace your default "new tab" page.
